page.title: 02Life Styles (Birstall)
page.content: We think{Birstall}is a clean and well looked after place, it is a nice, quiet village which we enjoy living in very much.The paths around the market place have been built again and new shops have been opened. Birstall is a busy and fairly noisy place on Thursdays when it is Market Day. Sometimes people write Graffiti on walls. We think that is the only thing that spoils Birstall.In Birstall there are about 47 shops.The Market Place has been used for different things including Public Parking, Taxi Parking, and Market.On Bradford Road there are many mills. In Birstall there is one Library which stands on the top of a Community Centre.There are also 3 Primary Schools in Birstall, Birstall County J.&I., St.Peter'S JMI&N and St Patrick's JMI&N.
